title: 80/240. Support account for peacekeeping operations
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/80/240 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
31 December 2025 
25-21259 (E) 
*2521259* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 148 
Administrative and budgetary aspects of the financing of the 
United Nations peacekeeping operations 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 30 December 2025 
 
 
[on the report of the Fifth Committee (A/80/568, para. 19)] 
 
 
 80/240. Support account for peacekeeping operations 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Having considered the report of the Secretary-General on the revised estimates 
relating to the proposed programme budget for 2026 and the support account for 
peacekeeping operations for the 2025/26 period,1 the report of the Independent Audit 
Advisory Committee on internal oversight2 and the related report of the Advisory 
Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions,3 
 
1. 
Takes note of the report of the Secretary-General and the report of the 
Independent Audit Advisory Committee; 
 
2. 
Endorses the conclusions and recommendations contained in the report of 
the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions. 
 
69th (resumed) plenary meeting 
30 December 2025 
 
_______________ 
 
1 Relevant parts of A/80/400. 
 
2 A/80/90/Add.1. 
 
3 A/80/538.

paragraphs.1: Takes note of the report of the Secretary-General and the report of the Independent Audit Advisory Committee;
paragraphs.2: Endorses the conclusions and recommendations contained in the report of the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions. 69th (resumed) plenary meeting 30 December 2025 _______________ 1 Relevant parts of A/80/400. 2 A/80/90/Add.1. 3 A/80/538.
